name: Arkansas
summary_text: Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.

name: Pretty Persuasion
summary_text: A 15-year-old girl incites chaos among her friends and a media frenzy when she accuses her drama teacher of sexual harassment.

name: The Gunfighter
summary_text: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

name: Pandora's Box
summary_text: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

name: Catch a Fire
summary_text: A drama about terrorism in Apartheid-era South Africa, revolving around a policeman and a young man who carries out solo attacks against the regime.

name: Little Big League
summary_text: A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.

name: Dead Birds
summary_text: A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.

name: Triple Threat
summary_text: When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.

name: Burnt Offerings
summary_text: A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.

name: The Boys Are Back
summary_text: A sports writer becomes a single parent in tragic circumstances.

name: First Sunday
summary_text: 2 bungling, petty criminal BFFs try to rob a church, but someone from staff beat them to it. They spend the night with the church staff to get the money.

name: The Last Days of American Crime
summary_text: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

name: The Ice Pirates
summary_text: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

name: The Long, Hot Summer
summary_text: Accused barn burner and conman Ben Quick (Paul Newman) arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.

name: A Man and a Woman
summary_text: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

name: Marco Polo: One Hundred Eyes
summary_text: Before he lost his sight. Before he pledged his service to Kublai Khan. Hundred Eyes saw what made him into the deadly assassin who trains Marco Polo.

name: Dear Wendy
summary_text: A young boy in a nameless, timeless American town establishes a gang of youthful misfits united in their love of guns and their code of honor.

name: The Sword of Doom
summary_text: Through his unconscionable actions against others, a sociopath samurai builds a trail of vendettas that follow him closely.

name: The Innocents
summary_text: 1945. Mathilde is a French Red Cross doctor working on a mission to help the French survivors of the German camps. While she works in Poland, she is asked for help by a nun. In her convent, several nuns are pregnant.

name: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
summary_text: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.

name: Dying of the Light
summary_text: When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.

name: Lucky Numbers
summary_text: A television weatherman scams a local lottery.

name: T-34
summary_text: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles.

name: The Valet
summary_text: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

name: Lust Stories
summary_text: Four short films by four of India's biggest directors exploring love, sex and relationships in modern India.

name: About Cherry
summary_text: A troubled young woman moves to San Francisco, where she becomes involved in pornography and aligns herself with a cocaine-addicted lawyer.

name: Suicide Room
summary_text: After suffering extreme humiliation at school, Dominik holes himself up in his room and begins spending all his time in a virtual reality chat room.

name: Reeker
summary_text: Strangers trapped at an eerie travel oasis in the desert must unravel the mystery behind their visions of dying people while they are preyed upon by a decaying creature.

name: The Four Musketeers: Milady's Revenge
summary_text: The Four Musketeers defend the queen and her dressmaker from Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter.

name: Heartburn
summary_text: She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.

name: Ex Drummer
summary_text: Three handicapped losers who form a band ask famous writer Dries to be their drummer. He joins the band and starts manipulating them.

name: Alice, Sweet Alice
summary_text: In 1961, a divorced catholic couple's life is turned upside down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Communion, and a series of subsequent stabbings.

name: Occupation
summary_text: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion. As they struggle to survive, they realize they must stay one step ahead of their attackers, and work together for a chance to strike back.

name: Tuntematon sotilas
summary_text: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

name: Gunda
summary_text: When a coolie's family is murdered by a group of gangsters and politicians, he swears revenge on them.

name: Foolproof
summary_text: Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.

name: Picture This
summary_text: A high school girl is invited to a party by the most popular boy in school -- only trouble is, she's grounded.

name: Godmothered
summary_text: A young and unskilled fairy godmother ventures out on her own to prove her worth by tracking down a young girl whose request for help was ignored.

name: Pretty Baby
summary_text: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

name: Two Women
summary_text: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

name: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
summary_text: An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.

name: Heartless
summary_text: Jamie Morgan, a young man with a large heart-shaped birthmark on his face, discovers that there are demons on the streets of East London.

name: Altitude
summary_text: After a mysterious malfunction sends their small plane climbing out of control, a rookie pilot and her four teenage friends find themselves trapped in a deadly showdown with a supernatural force.

name: Matinee
summary_text: A small-time film promoter releases a kitschy horror film during the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: High Art
summary_text: A young female intern at a small magazine company and a drug-addicted lesbian photographer slowly fall in love while exploiting each other to advance their respective careers.

name: Jing wu feng yun: Chen Zhen
summary_text: Chen Zhen, believed dead, returns to 1930s Shanghai under a false name. He joins a mob boss for info on the Japanese incl. a long kill list and at night fights the Japanese masked.

name: The Marksman
summary_text: A rancher on the Arizona border becomes the unlikely defender of a young Mexican boy desperately fleeing the cartel assassins who've pursued him into the U.S.

name: Les femmes du 6e étage
summary_text: In 1960s Paris, a conservative couple's lives are turned upside down by a group of Spanish maids that live in the same building.

name: The Missouri Breaks
summary_text: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

name: Una
summary_text: A woman confronts an older man, her former neighbour, to find out why he abandoned her after they had a sexual relationship.

name: Enter Nowhere
summary_text: Three strangers arrive one by one at a mysterious cabin in the middle of nowhere only to learn they've been brought together for a reason.

name: The Vanishing of Sidney Hall
summary_text: Sidney Hall finds accidental success and unexpected love at an early age, then disappears without a trace.

name: Kiss Me
summary_text: A young woman engaged to be married finds herself in an affair with her soon-to-be stepmother's lesbian daughter.

name: Shogun Assassin
summary_text: When the wife of the Shogun's Decapitator is murdered and he is ordered to commit suicide by the paranoid Shogun, he and his four-year-old son escape and become assassins for hire, embarking on a journey of blood and violent death.

name: Cactus Flower
summary_text: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

name: Airport '77
summary_text: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

name: Fire and Ice
summary_text: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

name: The Curse of Frankenstein
summary_text: While awaiting execution for murder, Baron Victor Frankenstein tells the story of a creature he built and brought to life - only for it to behave not as he intended.

name: Afternoon Delight
summary_text: Rachel tries to spice up her marriage with a trip to a strip club. She befriends McKenna who gave her a lapdance. She moves in with Rachel's family and becomes a nanny for the son.

name: Bats
summary_text: Genetically mutated bats escape and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

name: Beyond the Reach
summary_text: In the Mojave Desert, a naked and unarmed hunting guide runs from a wealthy hunter who wants to ensure his silence in the death of an old man.

name: Addicted
summary_text: A gallerist risks her family and flourishing career when she enters into an affair with a talented painter and slowly loses control of her life.

name: Hilary and Jackie
summary_text: The tragic story of world renowned classic cellist Jacqueline du Pré, as told from the point of view of her sister, flautist Hilary du Pré-Finzi.

name: La cage dorée
summary_text: For thirty years now Maria and José Ribeiro have been living on the ground floor of a Haussmannian building in one of the most exclusive districts of Paris. Everybody loves this nice couple...                See full summary »

name: Blackmail
summary_text: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.

name: Tamara
summary_text: Tamara, an unattractive girl, who is picked on by her peers returns after her death as a sexy seductress to exact revenge.

name: White Girl
summary_text: Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.

name: Bulbbul
summary_text: A man returns home after years to find his brother's child bride now grown up and abandoned, and his ancestral village plagued by mysterious deaths.

name: The Man from Laramie
summary_text: Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

name: Batla House
summary_text: After a deadly encounter, a police officer struggles to catch the fugitives and prove the police acted lawfully, while being despised by the whole nation.

name: Things Heard & Seen
summary_text: An artist relocates to the Hudson Valley and begins to suspect that her marriage has a sinister darkness, one that rivals her new home's history.

name: Dolls
summary_text: A group of people stop by a mansion during a storm and discover two magical toy makers and their haunted collection of dolls.

name: The Firemen's Ball
summary_text: A volunteer fire department throws a party for their former boss with the whole town invited, but nothing goes as planned.

name: Heaven Can Wait
summary_text: An old roué arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.

name: Maqbool
summary_text: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

name: Belly
summary_text: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.

name: Hogfather
summary_text: It's Hogswatch (equivalent to Christmas) on the Discworld and the Hogfather has gone missing, requiring Death to take his place while his granddaughter Susan endeavors to find out what has happened.

name: Waiting to Exhale
summary_text: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with the male gender.

name: Avaze gonjeshk-ha
summary_text: When an ostrich-rancher focuses on replacing his daughter's hearing aid, which breaks right before crucial exams, everything changes for a struggling rural family in Iran. Karim motorbikes ...                See full summary »

name: Shivaay
summary_text: A skilled mountaineer races against time to rescue his mute daughter from the clutches of human traffickers in Bulgaria.

name: Hondo
summary_text: Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

name: The Black Cat
summary_text: American honeymooners in Hungary become trapped in the home of a Satan-worshiping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.

name: Carrie
summary_text: Carrie White is a lonely and painfully shy teenage girl with telekinetic powers who is slowly pushed to the edge of insanity by frequent bullying from both her classmates and her domineering, religious mother.

name: The New York Ripper
summary_text: A burned-out New York police detective teams up with a college psychoanalyst to track down a vicious serial killer randomly stalking and killing various young women around the city.

name: The Monster
summary_text: After a series of bizarre actions, Loris is mistaken for a serial killer. Jessica, a policewoman in undercover, will try to induce him to commit a murder.

name: Father Goose
summary_text: During World War II, a man persuaded to live on an isolated island and spot aircraft finds himself responsible for a teacher and several students, all female.

name: Class
summary_text: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

name: Smoke Signals
summary_text: Arnold rescued Thomas from a fire when he was a child. Thomas thinks of Arnold as a hero, while Arnold's son Victor resents his father's alcoholism, violence and abandonment of his family.

name: Hurlyburly
summary_text: Hollywood movers and shakers dissect their own personal lives when everything seems to clash together.

name: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
summary_text: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

name: The Collector
summary_text: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.

name: After the Storm
summary_text: After the death of his father, a private detective struggles to find child support money and reconnect with his son and ex-wife.

name: Nurse
summary_text: By day, Abby Russell is a dedicated nurse, but by night, she lures cheating men to their brutal deaths and exposes them for who they really are.

name: Freelancers
summary_text: The son of a slain NYPD officer joins the force, where he falls in with his father's former partner and a team of rogue cops.

name: The Darwin Awards
summary_text: To investigate bizarre insurance claims that transpired in either accidents, death or both, a former cop and an insurance investigator travel throughout the country to look at the cases up close.

name: The Machine Girl
summary_text: Maimed while seeking revenge, a girl becomes stronger than ever.

name: Theater of Blood
summary_text: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

name: Kad porastem bicu Kengur
summary_text: During one peculiar night, the lives of several interconnected people are changed, as they rapidly experience love, disappointment, joy, greed and remorse.

name: The Little Vampire
summary_text: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

name: Eye of the Needle
summary_text: A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.

name: Death Defying Acts
summary_text: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him.

name: Gloria Bell
summary_text: A free-spirited woman in her 50s seeks out love at L.A. dance clubs.

name: C'est la vie!
summary_text: A hectic wedding party held in an 17th century French palace comes together with the help of the behind-the-scenes staff.

name: Premature
summary_text: A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.

name: Faces
summary_text: A middle-aged man leaves his wife for another woman. Shortly after, his ex-wife also begins a relationship with a younger partner. The film follows their struggles to find love amongst each other.

name: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
summary_text: A slovenly cable repairman becomes a big city Health Inspector, and is tasked with uncovering the source of a food poisoning epidemic.

name: Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding
summary_text: A violent chain of events ensues as a jailed criminal arranges to buy a car from a shady car dealer, unaware that his partner in freedom has squandered most of the money from their last bank robbery on horse race betting.

name: The Night Flier
summary_text: A reporter is on the trail of a vampiric murderer who travels by plane.

name: Tour de Pharmacy
summary_text: A mockumentary that chronicles the prevalence of doping in the world of professional cycling.

name: The Prowler
summary_text: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual graduation dance.

name: The War Zone
summary_text: An alienated teenager, saddened that he has moved away from London, must find a way to deal with a dark family secret.

name: Otherhood
summary_text: A grounded, soulful, celebratory comedy about three mothers and their adult sons. The film explores the stage after motherhood, Otherhood, when you have to redefine your relationship with your children, friends, spouse, and most importantly, yourself.

name: Inheritance
summary_text: A patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy the family.

name: Mammoth
summary_text: While on a trip to Thailand, a successful American businessman tries to radically change his life. Back in New York, his wife and daughter find their relationship with their live-in Filipino maid changing around them. At the same time, in the Philippines, the maid's family struggles to deal with her absence.

name: Harriet the Spy
summary_text: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?

name: Priest
summary_text: A homosexual Catholic priest finds out during confessional that a young girl is being sexually abused by her father, and has to decide how to deal with both that secret and his own.

name: Submarino
summary_text: Two brothers meet at their mother's funeral, each in his way on a path of self-destruction, both haunted by a tragedy in their youth.

name: Small Town Crime
summary_text: An alcoholic ex cop finds a woman on the roadside, left for dead. He offers to find the killer pro bono as P.I. Her granddad hires him. Things get nasty.

name: Sometimes They Come Back
summary_text: A man and his family return to his hometown, where he is then harassed by teenagers who died when he was a kid.

name: Open Hearts
summary_text: A Dogme film about an engaged couple that is torn apart after the man is paralyzed in an accident, and the woman falls in love with the husband of the woman who caused the accident.

name: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
summary_text: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

name: Trail of the Pink Panther
summary_text: Journalist Marie Jouvet (Joanna Lumley) attempts to uncover the mysterious disappearance of Chief Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Peter Sellers).

name: 5 Flights Up
summary_text: A long-time married couple who've spent their lives together in the same New York apartment become overwhelmed by personal and real estate-related issues when they plan to move away.

name: Catch That Kid
summary_text: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

name: Airport 1975
summary_text: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

name: After the Thin Man
summary_text: Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.

name: The Hound of the Baskervilles
summary_text: When a nobleman is threatened by a family curse on his newly inherited estate, detective Sherlock Holmes is hired to investigate.

name: Shanghai
summary_text: Prime leader of a campaign against a big government project is killed in what appears to be a road accident. An IAS officer is ordered to probe the incident and the veils of falsehood begin to drop.

name: Business Man
summary_text: Surya arrives in Mumbai to revive the mafia and ends up making enemies who threaten his life.

name: Khatta Meetha
summary_text: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.

name: The Dam Busters
summary_text: The story of how the British attacked German dams in World War II by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

name: Mephisto
summary_text: In early-1930s Germany, a passionate stage actor finds himself before a dilemma: renounce his apolitical stance and comply with the Reich's doctrine, or face oblivion. But, Faustian bargains never end well. What is the price of success?

name: The Giant Mechanical Man
summary_text: An offbeat romantic comedy about a silver-painted street performer and the soft spoken zoo worker who falls for him.

name: Satantango
summary_text: On the eve of a large payment, residents of a collapsing collective farm see their plans turn into desolation when they discover that Irimiás, a former co-worker who they thought was dead, is returning to the community.

name: The Old Dark House
summary_text: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

name: The Man Who Copied
summary_text: A Brazilian photocopier operator falls in love with a girl who lives in an opposite house and spends his evenings looking at her through his binoculars.

name: Delibal
summary_text: Two young people figure out how to shape their future according to love and/or career. Then one of them finds himself having to decide whether to live happily with his beloved wife with the...                See full summary »

name: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
summary_text: Vegeta is lured to the planet New Vegeta by a group of Saiyan survivors in hopes that he will be the king of their new planet. But when he finds that they have ulterior motives of universal...                See full summary »

name: Geronimo: An American Legend
summary_text: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the U.S. Government's subjugation of his people.

name: Life Stinks
summary_text: A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.

name: According to Greta
summary_text: A suicidal and rebellious teenager is sent to live with her grandparents for the summer, where life takes an unexpected turn.

name: Performance
summary_text: A violent gangster seeks refuge from the mob in the Bohemian home of a former rock star.

name: Plunkett & Macleane
summary_text: Two robbers are persecuted by the law, whose servants are not much better and even worse.

name: Eva
summary_text: A shy genius is employed by his former university to design robot software.

name: Sands of Iwo Jima
summary_text: Haunted by personal demons, Marine Sgt. John Stryker is hated and feared by his men, who see him as a cold-hearted sadist. But when their boots hit the beaches, they begin to understand the reason for Stryker's rigid form of discipline.

name: Pariyerum Perumal
summary_text: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

name: Çiçek Abbas
summary_text: Abbas is the assistant of Sakir who is a rogue guy, and Abbas has a dream which is to buy a minibus for his own.

name: Poolhall Junkies
summary_text: A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years, must go back to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy, the very man who held him back from greatness.

name: Guava Island
summary_text: A young musician seeks to hold a festival to liberate the oppressed people of Guava Island, even if only for a day.

name: The Secret of Moonacre
summary_text: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.

name: Ballad of a Soldier
summary_text: Young Russian soldier Alyosha earns a medal, but asks to visit his mother instead. His journey recounts various kinds of love during wartime.

name: Fourth Man Out
summary_text: A car mechanic in a small, working class town comes out of the closet to his unsuspecting, blue-collar best friends.

name: Rang zi dan fei
summary_text: In 1920s China, a bandit arrives in a remote provincial town posing as its new mayor, where he faces off against a tyrannical local nobleman.

name: Without a Clue
summary_text: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.

name: Neruda
summary_text: An inspector hunts down Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet, Pablo Neruda, who becomes a fugitive in his home country in the late 1940s for joining the Communist Party.

name: Dahmer
summary_text: Biopic about notorious American serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, taking place in both the past and the present.

name: Reprise
summary_text: Two competitive friends, fueled by literary aspirations and youthful exuberance, endure the pangs of love, depression and burgeoning careers.

name: Gönül Yarasi
summary_text: A single mother with a child meets a retired teacher who tries to keep pace with his new life and to protect them from her ex-husband.

name: 1BR
summary_text: Sarah tries to start anew in LA, but her neighbours are not what they seem.

name: The Housemaid
summary_text: A man's affair with his family's housemaid leads to dark consequences.

name: Recess: School's Out
summary_text: TJ and company must save summer vacation from disappearing forever.

name: My Favorite Wife
summary_text: Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.

name: Then She Found Me
summary_text: April, 39, wants a baby but her husband leaves her. When her adoptive mother dies, she's contacted by her bio mom, a TV talk show host. April starts seeing the divorced dad of one of her students at school.

name: Belle Epoque
summary_text: A 1931 Spanish military deserter finds himself on a lonely farm until the farmer's four daughters pay a visit and he falls for all of them.

name: Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
summary_text: Naomi and Ely have loved each other their whole lives, even though Ely isn't exactly into girls. The institution of a "No Kiss List" has prevented the two from rifts in the past, but bonds are tested when they both fall for the same guy.

name: Terri
summary_text: The story of a bullied fifteen-year-old boy in a small town as he struggles to adjust to his difficult life.

name: A Christmas Horror Story
summary_text: Interwoven stories that take place on Christmas Eve, as told by one festive radio host: A family brings home more than a Christmas tree, a student documentary becomes a living nightmare, a Christmas spirit terrorizes, Santa slays evil.

name: Le Mans
summary_text: Almost at the verge of documentary, film depicts a single auto race from the ground up.

name: Eteros ego
summary_text: A professor of criminology tries to solve five completely unrelated murders whose only link is quotes from Pythagoras.

name: The Seasoning House
summary_text: Sold at a brothel deep in the woods to work as a caretaker, a hapless deaf girl must summon the courage to fight for her life.

name: Patti Cake$
summary_text: PATTI CAKE$ is centered on aspiring rapper Patricia Dombrowski, a.k.a. Killa P, a.k.a. Patti Cake$, who is fighting an unlikely quest for glory in her downtrodden hometown in New Jersey.

name: Behaving Badly
summary_text: Teenager Rick Stevens has a crush on Nina Pennington. They form a friendship and embark on a rock n' roll journey together while Nina deals with her overbearing boyfriend, Kevin.

name: The Car
summary_text: A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

name: Wonderstruck
summary_text: Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

name: Claire's Knee
summary_text: On lakeside summer holiday, a conflicted older man is dared to have a flirt with two beautiful teenage stepsisters despite his betrothal to a diplomat's daughter and the fact that the girls have boyfriends.

name: Magic
summary_text: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

name: What's New Pussycat
summary_text: A playboy who refuses to give up his hedonistic lifestyle to settle down and marry his true love seeks help from a demented psychoanalyst who is having romantic problems of his own.

name: The Horse Soldiers
summary_text: In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.

name: Aitraaz
summary_text: A man is accused of sexual harassment by his former lover and he has to prove his innocence in order to restore his dignity.

name: Next of Kin
summary_text: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

name: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
summary_text: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

name: Vamps
summary_text: Two female vampires in modern-day New York City are faced with daunting romantic possibilities.

name: Grey Gardens
summary_text: The lives of Edith Bouvier Beale and her daughter Edith, aunt and cousin of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis.

name: Tender Mercies
summary_text: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

name: The Last Five Years
summary_text: A struggling actress and her novelist lover each illustrate the struggle and deconstruction of their love affair.

name: With a Friend Like Harry...
summary_text: Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel's life... and things take a sinister turn.

name: Il Sorpasso
summary_text: An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student for a two-day ride through the Roman and Tuscany countries.

name: Hard Times
summary_text: The adventures of a drifter turned illegal prize-fighter during the Depression Era in New Orleans.

name: Avanti!
summary_text: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon-father's body only to discover dad died with his mistress of long standing.

name: The Hound of the Baskervilles
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.

name: Celtic Pride
summary_text: Two over-loyal Celtic fans kidnap their opponent's star player in order to guarantee their team the championship.

name: Venom
summary_text: A group of teenagers fear for their lives in the swamps of Louisiana, chased by Mr. Jangles, a man possessed by 13 evil souls, and now relentless in his pursuit of new victims.

name: Escape Room
summary_text: Six friends test their intelligence when an escape room they participate in takes a dark and twisted turn.

name: Luck by Chance
summary_text: When Vikram gets tapped to play the male lead in a Bollywood film, he can't believe his luck. But it may ruin his relationship with his girlfriend.

name: I'll Be Home for Christmas
summary_text: A college student faces an impossible journey when he is left stranded in the desert, thousands of miles from home, with no money and only a few days left until Christmas.

name: Vagabond
summary_text: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

name: Baaghi 3
summary_text: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.

name: Miracle Mile
summary_text: A young man hears a chance phone call telling him that a nuclear war has started and missiles will hit his city in 70 minutes.

name: Scrooge
summary_text: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

name: A Bay of Blood
summary_text: The murder of a wealthy countess, which was erroneously deemed suicide, triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to take over her large estate.

name: Big Deal on Madonna Street
summary_text: A motley quintet of inept small-time thieves attempt the burglary of a local pawnshop in this Italian farce.

name: Cold Souls
summary_text: Paul is an actor who feels bogged down by his participation in a production of Chekov's play, Vanya.

name: Foodfight!
summary_text: The evil Brand X joins a supermarket that becomes a city after closing time.

name: Günesi Gördüm
summary_text: In the southeast region of Turkey, the Altun family lives in a small mountainside village plagued by a 25-year war, making their daily life a hellish struggle. As the war continues to ...                See full summary »

name: Crooklyn
summary_text: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.

name: Election
summary_text: Rival gang leaders are locked in a struggle to become the new chairman of Hong Kong's Triad society.

name: Le Doulos
summary_text: A burglar betraying other criminals, prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend that might be as untrustworthy as he.

name: The Nun's Story
summary_text: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, disappointment, and World War II.

name: Good Kids
summary_text: Four high school students look to redefine themselves after graduation.

name: Gainsbourg: A Heroic Life
summary_text: A glimpse at the life of French singer Serge Gainsbourg, from growing up in 1940s Nazi-occupied Paris through his successful song-writing years in the 1960s to his death in 1991 at the age of 62.

name: May God Save Us
summary_text: Inspectors Velarde and Alfaro must find what appears to be a serial killer. This hunt against the clock will make them realize something they'd never thought about: neither one of them is that different from the killer.

name: Rogue Trader
summary_text: The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.

name: L.I.E.
summary_text: A 15-year-old Long Island boy loses everything and everyone he knows, soon becoming involved in a relationship with a much older man.

name: D.O.A.
summary_text: A college professor's day: his top student allegedly commits suicide, his wife presents him with divorce papers and he overnights in a freshman girl's dorm. The next day: more murders around him. Will he find the killer in time?

name: Happy, Texas
summary_text: 3 prisoners escape. 2 end up in Happy, Texas, where they're mistaken for a gay couple expected there to help with the small girls beauty pageant. As the 2 are paid $1000, they decide to stay until the heat is gone.

name: Wuthering Heights
summary_text: A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn
summary_text: The universe is thrown into dimensional chaos as the dead come back to life. Now Goku and Vegeta must track down the cause of this uproar.

name: Wiener-Dog
summary_text: A dachshund passes from oddball owner to oddball owner, whose radically dysfunctional lives are all impacted by the pooch.

name: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
summary_text: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

name: See You Yesterday
summary_text: Two Brooklyn teenage prodigies, C.J. Walker and Sebastian Thomas, build makeshift time machines to save C.J.'s brother, Calvin, from being wrongfully killed by a police officer.

name: Behzat Ç.: Seni Kalbime Gömdüm
summary_text: An agressive police officer tries to solve the mystery behind consecutive murders. While doing so, he must fight against his inner demons.

name: I Can Do Bad All by Myself
summary_text: When Madea catches sixteen-year-old Jennifer and her two younger brothers looting her home, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

name: Opening Night
summary_text: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

name: Cep Herkülü: Naim Süleymanoglu
summary_text: The biography of Turkish weight lifter, and champion of Olympics, Naim Suleymanoglu.

name: Husk
summary_text: A group of friends stranded near a desolate cornfield find shelter in an old farmhouse, though they soon discover the dwelling is the center of a supernatural ritual.

name: The Fountainhead
summary_text: An uncompromising, visionary architect struggles to maintain his integrity and individualism despite personal, professional and economic pressures to conform to popular standards.

name: Guest House Paradiso
summary_text: Richie and Eddie, a perverted loser and his alcoholic partner in crime, run the worst hotel in Britain: the Guest House Paradiso.

name: Kid Cannabis
summary_text: An eighteen year old high school drop out and his twenty-seven year old friend start trafficking marijuana across the border of Canada in order to make money and their lives are changed forever.

name: Kafka
summary_text: Kafka works during the day at an insurance company, where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.

name: Who's That Girl
summary_text: The life of an uptight tax lawyer turns chaotic when he is asked to escort a young woman newly released from prison, who persuades him to help prove her innocence.

name: And the Band Played On
summary_text: The story of the discovery of the AIDS epidemic, and the political infighting of the scientific community hampering the early fight with it.

name: Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie
summary_text: Two guys get a billion dollars to make a movie, only to watch their dream run off course. In order to make the money back, they then attempt to revitalize a failing shopping mall.

name: Happy Accidents
summary_text: Ruby Weaver, a woman from New York, believes she has found the man of her dreams. And Sam Deed is really such, except for he assures that he came from the future.

name: Borderland
summary_text: On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.

name: Josh
summary_text: Max, who lives with his twin sister Shirley in Goa, is enraged when he finds out that she has fallen in love with Rahul, his bitter rival Prakash's younger brother.

name: Suburban Commando
summary_text: An interstellar hero from a distant world visits Earth, and tries to fit in with a mundane, yet kind, suburban family.

name: Tai-Chi Master
summary_text: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

name: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
summary_text: A high school janitor has not recovered from his failed career as a tennis pro. He begins coaching his beloved sport to a group of misfits and leads them to the Nebraska State Championships.

name: Troop Beverly Hills
summary_text: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

name: Someone to Watch Over Me
summary_text: A married New York cop falls for the socialite murder witness he's been assigned to protect.

name: A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving
summary_text: Peppermint Patty invites herself and her friends over to Charlie Brown's for Thanksgiving, and with Linus, Snoopy, and Woodstock, he attempts to throw together a Thanksgiving dinner.

name: The Samaritan
summary_text: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.

name: Dügün Dernek 2: Sünnet
summary_text: The adventures of the box office sensation, Dügün Dernek (Unconventional Wedding) are all set to continue in Dügün Dernek 2: Sünnet (Unconventional Circumcision). After seeing his son ...                See full summary »

name: The Robe
summary_text: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

name: The Color of Pomegranates
summary_text: A surreal biopic of Armenian poet Sayat Nova, depicted through non-narrative amalgamations of images, hailed as revolutionary by Mikhail Vartanov.

name: Mother of Tears
summary_text: An American art student in Rome accidentally triggers the return of Mater Lachrymarum - the last surviving member of The Three Mothers - and must use her newfound magical powers to end the witch's campaign of violence and death.

name: Waist Deep
summary_text: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.

name: Drug War
summary_text: A drug cartel boss who is arrested in a raid is coerced into betraying his former accomplices as part of an undercover operation.

name: Gone Fishin'
summary_text: Two lifelong fishing buddies must overcome a series of obstacles to enjoy their ultimate fishing trip.

name: White Zombie
summary_text: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.
